LogPlayer Sample
===================================================================

This sample shows how to use LogPlayer functional.

   ./LogPlayer --channel 80 --packetsCount 300000 --connectivity ../Settings/config.Prod.xml --log ./data/B3Umdf.log --ifA enp2s0f1 --ifB enp2s0f1 --sendDelay 200 --sourceSwitchDelay 1000

To get all other command line parameters:

   ./LogPlayer --help
